timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this string be in the properties file so it could be translated?
timeline.author: danielb987

replies.bodyText: No, because this string text is stored in the configuration profile, and info in the config  profile must not be I18N'ed.
replies.author: devel-bobm

replies.bodyText: It would be good if these strings are marked with // NOI18N if they shouldn't be I18N'ed.
replies.author: danielb987
